Yonkers.The Cloisters: The Cloisters is a museum in Fort Tryon Park in Upper Manhattan, New York City specializing in European medieval architecture, sculpture, and decorative arts. Its architectural features are largely from the Romanesque and Gothic periods. The building centers on four cloisters—the Cuxa, Bonnefont, Trie, and Saint-Guilhem cloisters—sourced from French monasteries and abbeys.
